title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.1 - Applicability of other rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.1 - Applicability of other rules

State Regulations

Rules and regulations governing water supply applications
(see Parts 601 and 602 of this Title) shall apply in so far as they are
suitable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
604.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
